website_summaries.verdict: Choose these briefs if you want a high-cut design in a budget-friendly multipack.
pros: Classic nylon high-cut briefs with a seamless design
Stretchy material is comfortable and provides a stay-put fit
Six-pack of panties – a great deal by a top-selling brand

customer_reviews.title: Buy them. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.text: After having my second baby via C-section (and gaining weight), I desperately needed new, more comfortable underwear. I hate it when they are too tight, cut in or up, and when they rub my lower abdomen. These underwear saved me from insanity and a true "Yellow Wallpaper" moment. They have stretch, stay put, are super soft, do not have annoying tags, and do not irritate. I have now purchased 3 separate packs. I'm never going back.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Baird-Reed

customer_reviews.title: Fell a part in one wash!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the last one in the package that I opened a month ago! ALL OF THEM DID THIS to one degree or another. This is the worst yet! Do they make clone or fake undies like watches? If not SHAME on Fruit of The Loom!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these underwear. Very comfortable & completely cover your rear end. Do order a smaller size than you normally wear. They run very large. I usually wear XL or bigger & I got a size 6 & they fit well. As you wear them they stretch out a bit too, so order a smaller size. I originally ordered size 7 & then got size 6. Loved them so much, got another pack of size 6. Each order was different colors than what was shown, but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Judski

customer_reviews.title: They are the best fitting most comfortable panties I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm throwing out all my current underwear (which are 3 or 4 years old anyway) and replacing all of them with these. They are the best fitting most comfortable panties I've ever owned, including a "secret" type! Plus they truly show no panty lines, even under leggings! Never expected such a great women's product from Fruit of the Loom at such a great price! Very pleasantly surprised and pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeous

customer_reviews.title: Good job Hanes... I Love you Hanes 😍
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable very light fitting definitely no panty lines it is important though to buy your size difficult to know what your size is when you're buying things online and you can't see and feel and stretch the fabric I went a size down and I could have gone even another size down I usually wear an eight but I decided to go with six based on the reviews the material is very stretchy so I could have gone even lower with the size and still had a comfortable fit decided to keep regardless because the quality was good for the price as well as the quantity good job Hanes.
customer_reviews.author: Freedgrl33

customer_reviews.title: but...I ordered just ONE size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these and received them on time. I tried one on, fit and fabric was great. I took them all out of the package for washing. THAT'S when things got WIERD! My hubby (hmmm..keen eye!!) noticed the panties were not all the same size. That's when I lined them up and took a picture. I've seen variances/irregularities before, but seriously! REFUNDed!
customer_reviews.author: sunni

customer_reviews.title: One out of six failed after one use.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality on one of the six pairs in this pack. Worn once, washed once... destroyed. For this price I should be able to get more than one wash and wear out of these. Expected better of fruit of the loom. These fit great! Really comfortable and no lines... I really wanted to like these. Updated: Out of the entire pack I only have 2 pairs that remain somewhat decent. All the others are falling apart.. STAY AWAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Perilous

customer_reviews.title: Loved so much I bought more
customer_reviews.text: These were recommended for hiking as they quick dry and have no rubbing caused by seams. They work perfect. They are thin and silky, perfect under tights. My hiking partner says they slide a bit as she has no tush but I have plenty of 'base' so these panties stay put for me. Size 8 undies / 14 pants = Ex Lg. / hiking partner is a size 7 undies, 16 pants and needs a Lg in this brand & style.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley N. Wilkins

customer_reviews.title: These underwear were great and comfortable when I first wore them
customer_reviews.text: These underwear were great and comfortable when I first wore them. After one wash they were ripped to shreds and the thread was wrapped all around my whole load of laundry. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: mark_716

customer_reviews.title: Fruit of The Loom Women's Seamless Underwear - not the style I wanted
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this underwear seems decent, however two features I didn't care for. First, they are nearly a "brief" style. I was looking for something that was just a little lower cut, more 'hipster' style. This is not these...they fit almost like briefs. Second, because of the material mix, if you use any kind of panty liner/pad, they do not stay in place. The crotch area is not 100% cotton but rather a mix with nylon/spandex. This causes the adhesive strip on panty liners/pads not to stick or stay in place. They stick very lightly and eventually move around. They are comfortable but these 2 issues will keep me from purchasing again.
customer_reviews.author: rberg

customer_reviews.title: Not so soft and restrictive waistband.
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair of Fruit of the Loom Women's briefs that are so incredibly comfortable. Unfortunately they're getting pretty old so I had to order more. I tried in vain to order the exact same thing and thought these briefs were it. NOPE. Material is not as soft as my original pairs, but most importantly, the waste band is not fully elastic. I absolutely hate the waist band. It feels restrictive and does not fully stretch when I pull my pants down. I am considering returning these.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but big
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 7 but these fit large. I'll keep them since they're comfortably soft and it doesn't pay to return a package of panties. An update: I ordered size 6. I haven't lost weight and even these are a bit large. But I'd give them a 4 just because they are so soft and comfy. Not binding at the legs or top.
customer_reviews.author: MsDAB

customer_reviews.title: Do show panty lines
customer_reviews.text: These DO show panty lines. If you plan to wear these under leggings or slacks, keep shopping.
customer_reviews.author: TessTooTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: SO Comfortable, you almost forget you're wearing them!!❣️
customer_reviews.text: WOW! InCrEdIbLy SOFT! Never Needs Fabric Softener, EVER!! AND OH, SO Comfortable, you almost forget you're wearing them!!❣️ THIS REVISION IS TO CHANGE MY *FIVE*STAR*RATING* TO 2 STARS!!! ALL OF THE BRIEFS ARE UNRAVELING AT THE WAIST BAND, ALMOST AS IF THEY HAD BEEN HEAT SEALED AND THE BAND IS SEPARATING! THIS IS SUCH A DISAPPOINTMENT!!! they are still very comfortable... And I'm crying over this development!
customer_reviews.author: X24 Brog

customer_reviews.title: Item codes do not distinguish type of panty
customer_reviews.text: Just a heads up, even though the item number is the same , FOL uses the same item number for different panties. For example I was looking to purchase more of the RN13765 CA number same. When I got these, even though they have the same codes, the material of construction and MFG place is totally different. The ones I wanted are made in Bangladesh and are made of 48% nylon, 41% poly and %13 spandex. If you are looking for a specific panty, look at materials , not just the item codes.
customer_reviews.author: ditchqueen

customer_reviews.title: Finally, no indents in my waist/hips.
customer_reviews.text: I HATE underwear bands. I have hips for days. The band is always somehow digging into my sides/hips. If I find a good pair with a lace band, the underwear will slip. THESE are fantastic. The waist is amazing...it doesn't pinch, push or make even the slightest indentation. These are so comfortable. I highly recommend for anyone looking for a soft, forgiving pair of under garments that wont leave lines!
customer_reviews.author: Carly Jude

customer_reviews.title: Unravelling
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed. I bought the same items 2 years ago and still have most of them. I ordered again and I cannot believe that they are coming apart at the waist band. These are the most comfortable panties I have ever worn but I will not be ordering them again. Too late to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: These Are What I've Been Looking For
customer_reviews.text: I loved these so much that I reordered another package right away. I don't normally like high-cut but these fit perfectly and are so comfortable I hardly know I'm wearing any at all. The material is soft and light and the colors are pretty. I would highly recommend these to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Melody Flynn

customer_reviews.title: Unlined crotch area
customer_reviews.text: Really surprised to find the crotch area is unlined on these panties. The fabric is actually really nice & smooth, soft & stretchy. But because if this, pantyliners have a hard time staying put on the unlined stretchy fabric.
customer_reviews.author: C D

customer_reviews.title: Runs Big
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are very comfortable and the material is very soft and stretchy, but the sizing is off. When selecting a size I suggest ignoring the numbered sizes all together and going with your usual S-M-L size. There is so much extra room in these that the fabric bunches up in the front and back. Also, it's worth noting that they don't stick well to pantyliners and pads - they end up folding up and sliding around on the seat. I will still wear these and I might even purchase a size smaller to see if they'll work for me.
customer_reviews.author: LoverofPrime

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE!! No riding up no falling down
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these! I got hi cut they aren't huge granny pants come/ fall below my belly button my problem is child bearing pooch under belly button if I get underwear too low it doesn't hold that in! These are the best panties ever! No elastic cutting in waist, no riding up in back and barely any panty lines which I could care less about. Without thick elastic idk how they stay in place but they do! I wear size 8 jean or 27 Levi I got size 5 I like them snug so I would get 4 if I could but I can't! Fantastic i hope they make these forever
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Very compfy and forgiving for a belly
customer_reviews.text: I was getting so tired of panties that would roll down my belly. I have a belly. It’s hard to find panties that will go over it and not slide down. These were very compfy, stayed in place and super stretchy for comfort. I can see why for some it may feel a bit larger than usual but for me they worked great! I thought the Nylon material is very good. Other 100% Cotton panties tends to stretch out and lose shape and support. The hi cut also helps a lot because I also have bigger thighs...sigh, sigh. I bought another package.
customer_reviews.author: sss333

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE these!!!
customer_reviews.text: Grew really tired of trying to purchase the Hanes cotton brand I have used for years only to have them change the elastic and cotton to be of the worst quality. Needed something stretchy that wouldn't cut and THESE are what I have been missing my whole life. Super stretchy and comfy. Ladies....be aware of this though....if you need to use a little something during that time of the month just know that "nothing" will adhere to this fabric. Literally, nothing!
customer_reviews.author: Sewing Fool

customer_reviews.title: Panty liners don't stick to these!
customer_reviews.text: Attention ladies panty liners don't stick to these! I wish I knew that before I ordered 2 packs. They don't have any extra fabric in the crotch area and stuff won't stick to the nylon. Next time I will look for cotton. Other than that they looked fine. I also got different colors than what is pictured but that was a non issue for me. I washed them when I got them and they did just fine until I went to try them out the next morning. Now I have to look for something else. Thanks a lot Fruit of the Loom you should fix this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Katrina Sosnowski

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful feeling panty
customer_reviews.text: Found one pack of these at a local Wal Mart, kept checking back but they never got any more in. Wonderful feeling panty, seamless, well made, etc. Bought two packs which should last me several years.
customer_reviews.author: CLH

customer_reviews.title: These run large PLUS they stretch out.
customer_reviews.text: The reviews I read said that these run large and they are right. There is very little structure to these underwear. They move in every direction, which is good for comfort but it also means they are stretched out by the end of the day. You wash them and they fit well once again until the end of the day and they've stretched out again. Also, the buyer should read the "fine print" . You do not receive the four solid colors shown as advertised. You get whatever they have available in your size. Mine were probably the least desirable in color and pattern. I won't buy this style again. Will probably stick with cotton.
customer_reviews.author: Buck n Diann

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with latex allergy. Comfortable & attractive.
customer_reviews.text: I have a latex allergy that decided to flare its ugly head recently when some of my previous underwear started to have the elastic waists peek out from the seams. This was NOT a pleasant surprise. I had purchased some of what I assume was an earlier version of these a few years ago and loved them, but couldn't find them in my local stores. They are very soft and comfortable and wash well without fading, stretching, or shrinking. They do fit a bit larger than expected, so I wish I would have ordered one size smaller, but overall I'm very happy with my purchase and will likely repurchase as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Drawers
customer_reviews.text: These are seriously my new favorites. They don't dig in but they still stay up. I only wish I got to pick what colors they sent. I got a pack of baby pastels that included a white pair. I HATE white underwear. It makes no sense to me. I would have much preferred the colors shown to the ones I got. But that is minor compared to how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: C. Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Great for c section undies
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after getting an emergency c section. I couldn't find any high waisted boxer type underwear(like they give you in the hospital) that could last more than a few washes. I had bought some more expensive high waisted underwear and the material was too thick and uncomfortable. I really wish I had gotten these sooner after wearing them! I bought one size up from my normal size since I have some postpartum tummy. These come up to my belly button and do not touch my incision. They are incredibly soft and comfy for this time. These are perfect for what I needed!
customer_reviews.author: panda

customer_reviews.title: These don’t breathe!!
customer_reviews.text: These underwear are comfortable. However, they don’t breathe!! Five minutes after they are on I can feel sweat forming, no matter the weather. I cannot deal with that. Also, after two months wear (rotating 2 packages of panties) I have had to throw out three pair because strands of the polyester thread used to make these started pulling away from the garment and coming apart at the edges. I’ve worn this brand my whole life, and I am so disappointed in the quality... it has gone downhill. I used to be able to get years out of their panties, now it’s only months.
customer_reviews.author: Sk8rlady

customer_reviews.title: These a great buy. Simply barely there and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These a great buy. Simply barely there and comfortable. My only regret is false reviews that stated to buy a size smaller. These are true to size and you should but your normal size. Maybe people say that because they're used to a lower cut on the tummy and these do come up higher which I love and look for in a panty. They do not have a cotton or padded crotch. I have washed them and no sign of snags and unraveling but I always wash my undergarments separately from other clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Leg openings too small, crotch too wide for a bikini cut.
customer_reviews.text: These might fit better on someone with a larger butt and smaller thighs, because they're uncomfortably tight around my legs and come up too high on my back to feel like proper bikini cut undies. The bikini cut is much more like the pairs of hipster cut undies I own than any bikini cuts. The material is silky in a slippery nonbreathable way, to the point where my pants don't like to stay up and sweat doesn't wick away like I'd've hoped. I wouldn't buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Ely

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY!! GET THESE.
customer_reviews.text: After over a year of getting let down, Spending money, searching for the perfect pair of seamless underwear, i have finally found the ones. I highly highly recommend these Underwear. Especially if you are a bigger girl like Me. I gained 70lbs with my pregnancy,had a c section, and was so tired of underwear too tight, balling up, not coming up high enough, etc. and THESE ARE THE ONES!! Im 220lbs and 5’4 and i got a 2x(9). There are NO PANTYLINES LADIES!! and, they stretch perfectly and don't squeeze me! They didn't shrink in the dryer. Buy these
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn emma

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! The item fits as expected but during the first wash every pair released long threads which got completely tangled with the other clothes in the wash. It took several minutes to seperate them. I had to throw every pair of panties in the garbage!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sammi

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these panties! They feel good, and they aren't totally seamless (what panties could be?!) but they're definitely less seamless than many other panties! Very nice, bought one, then bought another.
customer_reviews.author: LISA D THOMPSON

customer_reviews.title: Could order a size down
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear size 7/large, and they were a little big when I tried them on. Not so baggy that I can't wear them, but I'll probably need to wash them in warm/hot water to shrink them down a bit. I have a curvy figure so I definitely can say you could/should order a size down from your usual size and they would fit perfectly (especially if you have more narrow/slender hips). The fabric is very soft and comfortable, and no lines show through legging or tights. Overall I think this was a good purchase and would order from them again. My only complaint is the color variation could be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, but panty line shows
customer_reviews.text: These panties are very confortable and stay in the place well (although I’ve only worn them with leggings so far; not sure if that would be different with looser fitting bottoms). However there is most definitely still a very obvious panty line, which was really the whole reason I bought these was to avoid that. Maybe someone with a bit of a slimmer backside wouldn’t have this issue? (I almost attached a pic, but then rethought the implications of posting a butt selfie on the internet attached to my name...so no...)
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Soooooooo comfy
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been a cotton girl for a long time and I didn’t know these weren’t when I bought them but let me tell you—I’m switching. I also got some different brand ones at the same time and I choose these ones every time. I’m old enough that I don’t care about underwear lines anymore even though I probably should, and what I like about these is that there really isn’t one. I’m buying more. Probably right now actually. Oh I will say that if you’re a panty liner person like me, they don’t stick well to this material but that could also be the liners. Dunno.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Not Seamless, Panty lines are visible
customer_reviews.text: This underwear does show panty lines when worn with my yoga pants and jeans. There is a seam that goes across the lower portion of your butt. It also seems like this underwear stretches out as the day goes on. They also move around a lot as they get bigger throughout the day. I'm 5'6'', 120-125lbs, and I bought a size 5. I tried a bigger size too, but they were way too big. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: eclyde

customer_reviews.title: Best panties I've bought in 20 years!
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed that I got 6 pairs of panties for $10 that are so so comfy and fit so well. Panties are really expensive, and hard to find the right fit, so I was a bit leery about how inexpensive these were. But they arrived quickly, and I washed them (always wash them first), and tried them - and they covered my butt and didn't shift around. They are constructed well (although don't have a double layer in the crotch, but most nylon seamless panties don't. I'm ordering more right now - I LOVE them! Thank you, Fruit of the Loom.
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Box was not wrapped in plastic, like other products I received. Box was broken on top and looks like it had been opened prior to delivery. Item pictures and description says solid color. Some of the items have designs on them. This was a replacement item as first order also had designs on them
customer_reviews.author: caseyPT

customer_reviews.title: Lovely and Silky
customer_reviews.text: The fit of these underwear/panties are just so comfy, fit nice and hold their shape pretty well, but they do quite often come apart on the sides. Yet, I've found with gently pulling back up without holding on to the sewn sides you will stop it from happening! I'm a size 18 to 20 and the size 9 is what I wear so to help you know what size may be yours! :) And to the manufacture "Fruit Of The Loom" of these undies, please keep on making them as they're mighty fine! Like the material and fit!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: B. K.

customer_reviews.title: These undees fall apart in the wash
customer_reviews.text: I loved the feel and comfort, but after only a few weeks, they are falling apart in the wash, with big clumps of threads tangling around my other clothes. Other pairs were even worse than the one in the photo. Now I have to buy more...
customer_reviews.author: Deborah HubbardTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great for C-section recovery!
customer_reviews.text: I had an unplanned c-section and was not prepared for when I got home. I needed high-waisted underwear and fast, which is difficult in the middle of a quarantine. Amazon and Fruit of the Loom to the rescue! These are super soft, stretchy, don't pill in the washer and dryer, and relatively seamless, even in yoga pants. I may never go back to "cute" underwear again! I bought a large, which is about the size I normally wear, and it fits perfectly. These are just stretchy enough that they fit even as my abdomen and waist got smaller during recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is off. I'm a size 16 or XL in pants and for this brand I have to go up a size. It is comfortable and often times it doesn't feel like I'm wearing anything. Wish it did have a cotton in the center but I don't have to adjust my underwear when wearing pants and that is wonderful. The colors and patterns are blah and as I get older I like having more coverage on my behind so I'll take comfort over style. Overall these will be my go to underwear and hopefully they will last a good bit.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: I like the comfort and stretch
customer_reviews.text: For me, the stretchiness makes them comfortable to wear. They are not my favorite fit or material but they are decent for daily wear and I like variety so they do just fine in the rotation between washing cycles. The multi packs are a good deal so I would buy them again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: TypicalAmericanConsumer

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: I've worn Hanes for years but decided to try Fruit of the Loom after reading the reviews. Love the fabric, love the fit, love no seams and really love no panty lines. I'm a tich under 5'4", 122 lbs with 37.5" hips and went with a size 6, which is perfect for me. No riding up, no bunching, feels like I am not wearing anything. Get these.
customer_reviews.author: CVT

customer_reviews.title: Good for inexpensive underwear
customer_reviews.text: The other reviews are correct. The quality isn’t amazing and they start to develop strings after a wash or two. But if you cut the strings off as they happen these can last for a few years. They are a silky fabric. And very soft. If the elastic digs in, order a size larger—correctly fitting ones don’t dig in. My one annoyance is the the elastic band likes to make a snap sound and flip over so it’s folded down. I find the feeling annoying as well as the sound—kinda sounds like a short toot.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A.

customer_reviews.title: Comfy undies
customer_reviews.text: I found a set in a big box store on clearance, and bought them in price. They are seamless, smooth and soft! They wash easily and dry fast! I wear them for hiking and THEY DON'T RIDE DOWN. They slide a little under certain fabrics, so try them under different jeans, leggings and cotton/poly. I like them a lot. And with summer coming up, they breathe really nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Estrella

customer_reviews.title: Very High Waisted
customer_reviews.text: These are very high waisted, unless I am reading something wrong, these said high cut, not high waisted. These come up past my belly button. You can see the top of these panties with any blue jeans I wear. If you love high waisted panties, then these are the ones for you.
customer_reviews.author: prnesskc

customer_reviews.title: NOT SEAMLESS
customer_reviews.text: These Are not seamless! Anybody who says they are must be smoking crack. Telltale sign is the band around the waist and the legs -It’s finished elastic. I should’ve listened to the other reviews it said they weren’t but thought I would try it. Don’t waste your time if you’re looking for seamless
customer_reviews.author: rachel

customer_reviews.title: Wrong Colors
customer_reviews.text: I’m giving this a rather low review, simply because the colors are not even close to what was depicted. These were supposed to be assorted bright colors — medium blue, and some other complimentary shades. Ive included a picture of what I actually received. I’ll be keeping these, because I lost an obnoxious amount of weight and need new underwear. These are comfortable, very soft, and fit about as expected. It’s been my experience that Fruit of the Loom panties are just a hair bigger than Hanes, so keep that in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Not seamless
customer_reviews.text: I have a 29 inch waist and 39 inch hips and the medium fit perfectly and they’re cute enough for everyday wear. However, they are most definitely NOT seamless. They have your typical elastic band around the thighs and butt that show major panty lines under my work pants. You can’t see them as well with jeans, so that’s what I’ll be wearing them under but if you’re looking for something to wear under slacks I would buy something else.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and big
customer_reviews.text: Pros: soft, stretchy Cons: they looked really big for the size I bought, there were already pulls/snags in the pair I took out of the box, no cotton crotch I only looked at one pair, but I could already tell they are very fussy and will probably run like pantyhose if you have a hangnail or sharp fingernail. They already have snags and elastic fragments sticking out, which you can see in my photos. Can't imagine what they will look like after being worn a few times.
customer_reviews.author: ChattaGram

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. I already own fruit of the loom underwear that's 100% cotton and I wasn't super impressed with their quality, but I'm much happier with these. I haven't washed them yet so my opinion on the quality may change. I find them very comfortable and cute. I know the colors you may receive is random but I'm super happy with what I got. I'm usually a six in underwear but I purchased a 5 since my cotton ones are that size and fit well. I find that these stretch and fit nicely (I would say that the stretch does not require you to size down in order to accommodate.) Very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Soft but too stretchy
customer_reviews.text: They are soft. But they are more stretchy than some fabrics of this type and so seem to fit larger than intended. They do not have a reinforced or 2-ply crotch panel. So they feel thin. They look alright but won't serve me well for my underwear needs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just retired from teaching, comfort is important, as teachers are always on display and tugging at one's panties is not an option. Can't tell you how many pairs I have trashed after a "rough" day, you know what I mean girls! Wish I had found these sooner. Comfortable with dresses, nice pants, jeans, skirts, and while riding horses. I gave flattering 4 stars only because with SOME clothing there is a visible panty line, which we all know is sometimes unavoidable- just wear a long top.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfy
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfy and a great price. They are very stretchy and don't sit tight on your skin so they don't show lines under clothes. They definitively run big. I'm normally a med, but ordered a small. Glad I did, they fit great. BTY, I haven' t wore a small since like never..LOL. They do run big.
customer_reviews.author: KandJ

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I didn’t expect much for the price of these, but they are great! Super soft and comfortable. I will definitely want to order more some day. They are not very stylish but they feel stretchy and smooth. Next time I’d order a size down since they stretch so easily I worry the elastic will only get looser with time. Also the colors shown aren’t exactly what you get. At least I did not. The navy blue is black and the blue and purple ones have zigzag stripes.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Pads wont stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: #1 reason i got these was for during my monthly. Normally I get all cotton but when I needed them all the sellers were price gouging & my Walmart was pandemic levels of out of stock so I settled for these polyester ones. HUGE mistake. My pads will NOT stay put. Very uncomfortable, very inconvenient, just plain annoying. Will have to make due till sellers have stopped going insane with the prices.
customer_reviews.author: Tamberlin

customer_reviews.title: Simply Yuck
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't tell from the description how the look and feel of these synthetic underwear would be. Took a chance and as soon as I opened the box I didn't even try them on. One look at the fabric and to this wearer it screams yuck - I wish I could relate it to something but it just reminds of something that I don't like the feel of next to my skin. It's a type of synthetic cheapness that I really don't care for so I returned them. In this case you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: OneSpiritGal

customer_reviews.title: I should have stuck with 100% cotton
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'7" + weigh 130lbs.... the size (7) fits perfectly - I do not like the material however.... I couldn't find bikini panties in cotton that was made by an American Manufactuer on here easily (I try to be aware of corporate policies etc. - so I won't buy Hanes). I'll have to try a different style like hipster fit in 100% cotton (Even the panal isn't cotton, not breathable).
customer_reviews.author: Dacosta

customer_reviews.title: Buy your size
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'5, 160 lbs. The colors I received are totally different from the posting (see picture). The undies have no compression They are high-waisted and high-cut which is what I was looking for. I have wide hips and I thought sizing up was a good idea, Nope. Buy your right size.
customer_reviews.author: denise_santi_simmons

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & Cute
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable with minimal panty-line visibility! I will definitely order these again. Be sure to check the sizing before you order since the sizing of the underwear is different from pants (ex. I wear a size 10 pants and a size 7 in this underwear).
customer_reviews.author: Ariel C.

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a return item with mixed sizes.
customer_reviews.text: The product is a great fit for me. Comfortable, breathable and stay in place. My only complaint is not with the product but with the packaging. The second purchase that I received was a mixed bag of sizes. I ordered medium and there was 2 pair of large and one pair of small in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage and gives panty line due to seams
customer_reviews.text: These panties are soft and stretchy and nice colors... but you need to be aware that they are "granny" style with a high waist and FULL rear coverage... and although they say they are seamless, they have thick seams along the edges that result I'm the dreaded pantylines. They are otherwise comfortable, but can't wear with anything fitted or when my husband might see them because they are not the slightest bit flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Amy M.

customer_reviews.title: One thing they don't tell you!!
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft these are, the colors, & the fit is perfect. The only reason I won't give 5 stars is because feminine pads won't stick to these underwear no matter what brand or type of pad so if you're on your cycle it would probably be best to keep some cotton underwear around because feminine pads will not stick. It is a crying shame because over all these are my favorite underwear in the whole world and I happen to like the daily pads just for fresh underwear but you can't use them on these underwear. I really wish they would make the cotton line where the pads go at least!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Shaine

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item the first time and was so pleased I put out a great review and bought another pack. The pack I received the next time was terrible. The colors were not what the picture had on it and they gave me 6 pair with crazy looking stripes and NOT solids like I ordered. I was SO disappointed but decided it was the fit I was primarily interested in. Unbelievably, the second batch are beginning to tear up. The seam is coming apart. Meanwhile, the first batch I ordered are still in great shape. I will never order again. No stars!
customer_reviews.author: Love to Scrap

customer_reviews.title: 41”Hips (size L too big). Comfy, soft and super stretchy
customer_reviews.text: Soft, comfy, but way too big and once used they stretch even more. The dryer does shrink a bit but not a lot. I bought for post surgery because I needed comfy underwear so they serve their purpose but I wouldn’t use this size undies for regular wear. I ordered size Large but could have gone with a medium, and I have a big butt 41”hips.
customer_reviews.author: Liz C.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT for postpartum and pregnancy!
customer_reviews.text: MY STATS: 5'5" and about 185 pounds (postpartum) --- These fit at height of pregnancy (220 pounds) SIZE: 9 PROS: - Stretch is great for pregnancy / postpartum - Thin / not hot, but not low quality CONS: - No tummy control OVERALL: I bought a LOT of panties to choose from, and these are probably my favorite comfy panties.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: For some reason they seem a lot bigger than similar underwear I bought a year ago, but that’s fine. They will shrink if you dry them, but if you keep drying them they will be ruined. If you want these to last forever, put them in a net bag (they sell them for lingerie/hose) so they don’t get snagged on anything else in your wash and then air dry. Also keep in mind you may not get same colors that are in the pic. The ones I just received have polka dots. These aren’t lovely to look at, just super comfortable, don’t show any lines, and they stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Chicken

customer_reviews.title: Beware- those are NOT the colors of the product.
customer_reviews.text: Great underwear, worn it for years. But take note- the colors you see here are NOT the colors you will get shipped to you! I usually buy mine at Target but I didn't like the colors they offered, so I came to Amazon and got these, based on the the image. Guess what. Same stuff as at Target. I guess the company only does the one pattern per season. The product is great, but I was a little miffed that the underwear wasn't the same colors.
customer_reviews.author: Skates of Wrath

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft material!
customer_reviews.text: These undies are made of very soft synthetic material. They are very comfortable. They are VERY HIGH and come all the way up to my belly button. Definitely granny panties. That is great for what I am using them for. I am wearing them with high wasted leggings while hiking and they are perfect. They stay put and stay dry. Highly recommend if you’re looking for some high wasted undies for comfort. I am a size 12-14 so I ordered size 7 (large) and they fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: AmyVsings

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and practical
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pack of these. They are so comfortable and don't have a panty line at the same time. What a plus. My only complaint is i wish they had packs that came in all lighter colors for summer clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne in GA

customer_reviews.title: horror panties
customer_reviews.text: These are the most horrible panties ever !!!!! They don't have double layer or any protection in the most critical area and sanitary napkins don't stick to them.They are way too large for the size and the colors are disgusting. Pale pink!!!!!!. The look and feel so old fashioned, I'm sure my great grandmother wouldn't wear them.I need to check if I can return them
customer_reviews.author: Dorota Matusiak

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 1 size down and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These were for a teen and the feel and look are very modern and hip. She said they were extremely comfy especially in the waist band area. only issues is the colors are much darker then pictures, we got black, bordeaux and bordeaux striped. Was expecting a color assortment as shown but they are so comfy we will get another pack and hope for a different assortment.
customer_reviews.author: VIKTORIA ANANIKIAN

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is the most comfortable women's underwear I have found. Highlights: - No side seams (good for comfort and gives smooth profile) - Stretchy so fits well - No wedgies! - Band lays flat to minimize visible panty lines - Still look like new despite several washes To consider: - Runs slightly large - No as breathable as cotton panties - Provide a little more coverage than typical bikini style
customer_reviews.author: Tori P. :star:

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size down from what I usually wear because I have lost weight, but I still feel like they are just a bit big. But other than that, I absolutely love the material...more slinky than regular cotton briefs, but still very breathable and comfy. I was disappointed when I saw that the elastic was more apparent than I thought, but then I was pleasantly surprised when my underwear barely showed through my pants (I hate VPL, but I just can't stand thongs anymore!). Long story short, they were a pleasant surprise and I will probably buy more!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because of the thigh high, I have a difficult time finding any panties that fit nicely. These are great! They are comfortable, they don't fall over when you bend. I bought a second set because the fit so good.
customer_reviews.author: C Schaefer

customer_reviews.title: Received a different color than pictured -
customer_reviews.text: I gave this only 3 starrs as the colors on the picture is not what I received. I wanted the set they showed in the picture with the tan colo and lighter colors,, also did not want prints. I received really dark colors and printed panties. But, they are comfortable and the type I wanted. So, be aware! You probably NOT get the colors in the picture.
customer_reviews.author: YiPease

customer_reviews.title: are SUPER comfortable, and are great under unforgiving pants like ...
customer_reviews.text: These certainly are "full coverage" and run a bit large. They are advertised as "low rise" but I find that they come quite a bit higher than that. However, despite the size being a bit larger than expected, they did shrink a bit when washed, are SUPER comfortable, and are great under unforgiving pants like stretch pants. These might not be date-night panties, but they are comfy and perfect for daily wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy S.

customer_reviews.title: Generous fit
customer_reviews.text: A generous fit for me. I usually buy hi cut briefs a size smaller to be lower than my navel but higher than a bikini rise. A true du is too high for most my jeans. This was a tad more coverage than I expected but didn’t give the ugly bunch up top in the back. Soft and breathable material, no riding up. Will buy more. Probably get same ones in bikinis for the low cut jeans.
customer_reviews.author: A Shore

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: These are extremely comfortable and the design is perfect! I don’t have to worry about the top elastic coming off because it’s built in. I know I don’t have to tell the ladies reading this that the top of your underwear deciding to unravel is unsightly and upsetting. I bought Hanes and the entire top of my undies just unraveled and fell off. We shouldn’t have to buy underwear every month because they are so cheaply made. Love these I will buy them as long as I can!
customer_reviews.author: eternityofsong

customer_reviews.title: I had to keep checking to make sure I was wearing underwear they’re so comfy!
customer_reviews.text: It’s funny there’s a category for “flattering” because that they aren’t, but Omg so comfortable, light, breathable, and supportive. Because they’re not heavy, thick cotton, daily moisture actually dries. No annoying or painful elastic digging into you. I way sized up for maximum comfy. They’re pretty tall and may stick out of jeans. Buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha C. Davis

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these underwear
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these underwear! They have a silky feel that keeps them from sticking to your clothes. They fit very well without being "granny panties".
customer_reviews.author: sfrank

customer_reviews.title: Size down
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these panties! For years I've spent $$ on hi-cut panties made by Bali, Vanity Fair, Jockey and other brands. It seemed like I was always tugging down the back of the leg openings, no matter which brand. I read the reviews of this Fruit of the Loom panty, went with a Small as recommended (I am 5'8", 150 lbs and normally wear size 6 panty). They fit great, don't ride up, clothes slide smoothly over them, they breathe, and they wash and dry quickly. And they're inexpensive, to boot! I'm so happy I will be ordering them again.
customer_reviews.author: Mary B.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort At Last!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these at a local department store, for the first time, about 6 months ago. They are the most comfortable panties I have ever worn. Due to the health crisis, I have not been able to get out so I turned to Amazon like many others. The wait for delivery was a little longer than Amazon's usual speedy service but certainly expected during this time (Kudos to all of their workers!). The assortment of colors in this box is perfect for spring!
customer_reviews.author: C. Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight feel, but too lightweight for me
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The panties are stretchy and no tight waistbands. Cons: they are made of very thin fabric. I was hoping for a jersey or other knit type of fabric, but instead these feel more like a very thin Lycra. The lightweight feeling might appeal to some, but I was just looking for something standard with no tight waistbands.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Completely dissatisfied and would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This pack is poorly made and after one day of wearing it, the crutch has a loose string with a tear (as pictured). I’ve only had this pack less than four days. The material fell apart with one wear. Completely dissatisfied and would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Meg Janenson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect comfort undies
customer_reviews.text: I’m 27 and hate wearing bikini underwear around the house. I love high waisted panties to help keep my figure in place and just for comfort. I had Hanes and they were very uncomfortable. I was skeptical about these but am super happy with this purchase. My husband hates them but if I’m comfortable I ignore him. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Fairly comfortable except the bands around the legs don't seem to stretch at first as much as the rest of the underwear but they soon stretch and become un-noticeable. They are super light and comfortable . They are a low rise "brief", exactly as stated. I like the coverage they offer and how light weight they feel . They are worth a purchase .
customer_reviews.author: JeeperJA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty colors but buyer beware.....
customer_reviews.text: The colors and fit are great but the material is really thin and, being nylon, are about as thin as a pair of nylon hose and these panties get tears in them super easily just like nylon pantyhose so they are kind of a wear it a couple of times and throw it out item. Also, the crotch area is made of nylon (not cotton) so its doesn't wick away any moisture which can be unsanitary/unhealthy. I won't be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Fell in love with 6 pairs of panties.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these underpants!! I'm very picky about underwear because it can be difficult to find ones that fit right. But these are glorious!! My neather region is cradled comfortably, and the fabric is super soft and flexible. There's no tight areas, and since there's no elastic bands, there's nothing to dig into my skin. All 6 pairs are now my favorite underpants. And they're cute! I couldn't be happier with these products and I will definitely be purchasing more.
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Stretchy and soft
customer_reviews.text: These are soooo soft and comfy. I got them for the end of my pregnancy/wearing postpartum and they are perfect. They’re super stretchy and a nice cut/fit for pregnancy. I sized up one size and they fit perfectly. One downside: they are so soft that pads won’t really stick to them so keep that in mind!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Randall

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but questioning quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the 6 pairs came unravelled in the first washing. The remaining ones fit well and are soft. Hoping this was just a fluke, and the others will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Exparza

customer_reviews.title: Returned first ones too big
customer_reviews.text: Bought a package in my regular size which is a 6 and they were too big. I liked the material which was a microfiber. I returned them for a size 5 which fits good. The material on these ones was not like the original ones I bought more like a silky feel. Also the crotch is the same material and not cotton. I really don't like the waist band as it tends to roll. The first package had all the briefs in one box and the second one had a divided box with three in each. Don't know if I would buy again just because of the waist band.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable, BUT . . .
customer_reviews.text: Received my first order fast and the solid colors were great. Ordered more and the most horrible colors and patterns arrived. Would like to exchange them for the colors I want, but there is no guarantee I won't get the same ugly patterns again. May have to just return them and try some other brand.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my 92% nylon 8% spandex Fruit of the Loom underwear. These are 100% nylon and something was lost in translation. I would rate the 92/8's a 9.5. These are a 6.5. They run a bit big. I used to order size 9 and they fit like second skin. These a size 8 and a bit loose. Oh well, whenever you find the perfect product, it seems to be discontinued. C'est la vie.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable and stay in place
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and do not ride up. I ordered the assorted box and the box I received had none of the colors shown in the listing. I personally don't like the colors or the designs I received but I love the fit and want to order more. I ordered the hi cut and it seems there is only one choice to order and it is a gamble what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: Really soft and comfortable, but no choice of colors.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I’ve had these almost 2 yrs, and they are holding up well. I always launder them in a mesh bag on gentle cycle, and hang to dry. Washers are hard on knits; dryers destroy them! I went down a size, so the fit is good. I’m tall, so when I pull briefs up to my waist, leg holes are very high in front. Very good at eliminating panty lines. Super comfortable! I wish I could choose color palette. I was hoping for dark and/or bright colors, and got pastels.
customer_reviews.author: JRAZ

product_meta.title: Fruit of The Loom Women's Seamless Panties with 360° Stretch
product_meta.description: Color and Style May Vary (Assorted). Pesky panty lines and irritating side seams are a thing of the past with Fruit of the Loom’s Seamless hi-cuts! Made with 100% premium nylon, these panties have an amazing stretch that moves with you and fits perfectly to your shape. Flat ribbon elastic lays flat against your skin to eliminate panty lines and irritation from side seams. The waistband is smooth and comfortable, and as always, Fruit of the Loom panties are tag free for extra softness. The hi-cut silhouette sits above the hips and has leg openings cut higher towards the hips. These wardrobe essentials are perfect for everyday wear or special occassions and are sure to become your new go-to! Stock up on these must-haves with our convenient 6 pack!
feature_bullets: Stretch Fabric for the Perfect Fit
No Panty Lines and Tag Free
